source.name: Housing Code Violations, San Francisco, CA
source.description: The location of buildings, inspections and violations that were issued from code violations by the San Francisco Department of Building Inspection, San Francisco Department of Health, and The San Francisco Fire Department in the years 2008-2013. The data from the San Francisco Department of Public Health is for residential buildings only. The San Francisco Building Department and Fire Department’s inspections and violations include commercial and municipal properties. This data adheres to the House Facts Data Standard (www.housefacts.me) – which is a government open data standard that provides a uniform format for reporting governmental data on the regulation of health and safety laws for residential housing in a machine readable format. The specification links data to the residential building understanding that a single building may have multiple dwelling units and multiple owners.
